title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: I expect the externalized text to be displayed in the chart title even when the key is left blank.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a valid value for the externalize text in the chart title.
2. Leave the key blank in the properties file.
3. Observe that the text is not displayed in the chart title.
